ygData.subject: RE: How Lullaby used to be. (Results on how it is now)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You got close to double the number of total resists that I got (10/415). ... You got slightly fewer secondary resists than me (163/415 = 39.3% with lute).
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 3 Feb 2000, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
>
> I did another test last night, just to be sure how bad the nerfing of
> Lullaby really was, and to have a baseline to test against this patch to see
> if anything changes. I had the following results vs my West Freeport test
> subject.

These percentages are very close to what I got. But:

> Without Mandolin: 345
> With Mandolin: 218
>
> Number of Total Resists:
>
> Without Mandolin: 19 Pct:
> With Mandolin: 12

You got close to double the number of total resists that I got
(10/415).

> Number of Secondary Resists:
>
> Without Mandolin: 127 Pct: 38.9%!!!
> With Mandolin: 75 Pct: 36.4%!!!

You got slightly fewer secondary resists than me (163/415 =
39.3% with lute). This would support the theory that they
have a sign error in the charisma bonus for secondary resists,
as my charisma was 154 vs your 133. I'll have to test it
again tonight - I'll try to get to BB and get a skunk to spray
me, if they can still affect me at all.

Also, I'm going to hold off reposting this on the official
board until the Necro pet bruhaha dies down. Good work.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
